channel.title: Weird cant login on my site
channel.description: So.. I installed a website as some of you may have know ;) and now my web worked finnaly but there is still 1 thing. If I login with my server details it keeps on the same login page and just only refresh. If I look in phpmyadmin Ill see the details in my database to so.. what could be wrong? if you enter a wrong username or password it says invalid username or password but with correct information it just refreshs and does nothing. any help plz?

item.title: Weird cant login on my site
item.dc:creator: @cumescape cumescape
item.description:
@cumescape wrote:

Lol, stop using the crap. l2 code.

item.source: Weird cant login on my site

item.title: Weird cant login on my site
item.dc:creator: @imjohn10 imjohn10
item.description:
@imjohn10 wrote:

well the only bit of code that sends you to login.php is

if($_GET[‘host’] == “”)
{
header("location: ".returnHost().“login.php?host=go”);
}

try changing it to

if($_GET[‘host’] == “”)
{
header("location: ".returnHost().“login.php?host=go”);
exit;
}

Read full topic

item.title: Weird cant login on my site
item.dc:creator: @mod_lol1 mod_lol1
item.description:
@mod_lol1 wrote:

I use xampp
login.php:

[code]<?php
error_reporting(0);
include(“code-bin/main/base.php”);
$stage = 0;
$r = “index.php”;

$ref = $_SERVER[‘HTTP_REFERER’];

if($_GET[‘host’] == “”)
{
header("location: ".returnHost().“login.php?host=go”);
}
if(loggedUser() == 0 && !isset($_POST[‘username’]))
{
?>

<?php drawWindowTitle(); ?> <?php if(returnTheme() == "hd") { ?> <?php } else if(returnTheme() == "default") { ?> .buttons { width: 600px; height: 60px; position: relative; margin: auto; } .buttons a{ display: block; position: absolute; width: 260px; height: 40px; margin: 5px; background: #808080; font-weight: bold; color: white; text-align: center; border: 2px outset #909090;} .buttons a:hover { background: #A0A0A0; border-color: #ffffff} #button-left {left: 0px; top: 0px; padding-top:3px;} #button-left span.lev1 {background-image: url('themes/<?php echo $theme; ?>/img/login/open.gif');} #button-right {right: 0px; top: 0px; padding-top:3px;} #button-right span.lev1 { background-image: url('themes/<?php echo $theme; ?>/img/login/lost-your.gif');} span.lev1 { display: block; cursor: pointer; cursor: hand; position: absolute; top: -10px; left: -10px; width: 286px; height: 60px;} a:hover span.lev1 { background-position: 0 60px;} <?php } ?> <?php if(returnTheme() == "hd") { ?> <?php } else { ?>
<?php } ?> <?php if(returnTheme() == "hd") { //include("code-bin/themes/hd/menu.php"); include("code-bin/themes/hd/_login.php"); } else if(returnTheme() == "default") { include("code-bin/themes/default/_login.php"); } ?> <?php } else if(isset($_POST['username'])) { $result = mysql_query("SELECT * FROM users") or die(mysql_error()); while($row = mysql_fetch_array($result)) { if(strtolower($_POST['username']) == strtolower($row['username'])) { //$_SESSION['userId'] = $rowa['id']; $stage = 1; if (strtolower($_POST['password']) == $row['password']) { openUser($row['id']); $stage = 2; header("location: ".returnHost()."".$r.""); } } if($stage == 0 || $stage == 1) { header("location: ".returnHost()."note.php?m=1"); } } } else { header("location: ".returnHost()."".$r.""); } close(); ?>[/code] user.php: [code]<?php function loggedUser() { $passOn = false; /* if(isset($_SESSION['userId'])) { return $_SESSION['userId']; } else */ if(isset($_COOKIE["bdg_userId"])) { if(isset($_COOKIE["bdg_pass"])) { $result = mysql_query("SELECT * FROM users") or die("

Error: Cannot locate logged user.

"); while($row = mysql_fetch_array($result)) { if($row['id'] == $_COOKIE["bdg_userId"]) { if($row['password'] == $_COOKIE["bdg_pass"]) { $passOn = true; return $row['id']; } } } } else { return "0"; } } else { return "0"; } if($passOn == false) { return "0"; } } function startSession() { session_start(); } function destroySession() { //session_destroy(); setcookie("bdg_userId", "0", time()-43200); setcookie("bdg_pass", "0", time()-43200); } function openUser($a) { $resulta = mysql_query("SELECT * FROM users") or die(mysql_error()); while($rowa = mysql_fetch_array($resulta)) { if($a == $rowa['id']) { //$_SESSION['userId'] = $rowa['id']; setcookie("bdg_userId", $rowa['id'], time()+43200); setcookie("bdg_pass", $rowa['password'], time()+43200); } } } ?>[/code] and my web files dont have a client.java?..

item.source: Weird cant login on my site

item.title: Weird cant login on my site
item.dc:creator: @inertia inertia
item.description:
@inertia wrote:

We have no idea what you’ve done… Are you using a web application package like xampp or have you installed separate applications? What versions have you installed?

Alternatively, just go into your client.java and change pubic boolean noRefreshOnLogin = false; to pubic static abstract final boolean noRefreshOnLogin = true;

Read full topic
